AboutMe.firstParagraph: Hello! My name is Igor Amon, and I'm a frontend software engineer. I have approximately 6 years of experience in the development area. Today I work at Contruent developing applications with Vue.js. But although my focus is frontend, I also have experience with backend development, using Node.js and PHP.
AboutMe.secondParagraph: I have technical degree from ETEC Dr. Ruth Cardoso, a place responsible for showing me and falling in love with the technology area. Since then, I have been studying and improving myself more and more, always seeking to learn new technologies and methodologies.
AboutMe.thirdParagraph: I have a bachelor's degree in Information Systems from the Catholic University of Santos, where I was able to deepen my knowledge and develop better as a professional in the technology area.
